axis_supply.supply_status: POOR - Division severely understrength after El Alamein disaster. Reinforced with tanks (91 total) but chronic fuel/ammunition shortages. Extended supply lines from Sicily/Italy to Tunisia. Allied air superiority disrupts logistics. Operating as battle groups (Kampfgruppen) due to fragmentation.
notes: Reduced to 4 tanks by late Nov 1942, reinforced to 91 by Feb 1943
Allied air attacks on supply convoys from Sicily

allied_supply.supply_status: NOT APPLICABLE - Division not in North Africa theater. Relocated to Palestine 1 January 1943 for rest, refit, and training after El Alamein operations. Not engaged in combat operations during 1943q1.
